attributes.action: ignore the e-petition titled "Require mandatory installation of GPS speed-restrictors, radar-braking, squark-box & remote braking technology on all new vehicles"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is incredibly dangerous (not to mention ill-concieved) to remove that much control from the driver of a vehicle. There should at the very least be a device to overide the equipment in cases of emergancy where you are forced to exceed the speed limit or otherwise take evasive action to PREVENT an accident. Therefore, we ask that that the government ignores the petition.

rejection.details: Sorry, we don't accept petitions about other petitions.  You'll need to re-draft this with a clear call-to-action so that it works as a standalone petition
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
